title: Image Manifest
description: Schema for the image_manifest.json file, describing a collection of general images (screenshots, diagrams, icons) with basic metadata.

relativePath.description: Path to the image relative to the web server root directory (/mnt/Web), using POSIX separators. Includes 'images/' prefix.

filename.description: The name of the image file.

width.description: Width of the image in pixels.

height.description: Height of the image in pixels.

slug.description: A URL-friendly slug derived from the relativePath.

fileSize.description: File size in bytes. Null if not available.

lastModified.description: Last modification timestamp in ISO 8601 format. Null if not available.
